item.title: 使用 Folderclone 批量转存共享内容到自己的Google Drive
item.description: 安装 Folderclone Linux **Debian/Ubuntu **安装 1 2 3 4 5 6 apt update apt install python3-pip git screen -y git clone https://github.com/Spazzlo/folderclone.git cd folderclone pip3 install folderclone CentOS`把`apt-get`替换成`yum 因拷贝时间长，防止中断，强烈建
